subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: If the Nittany Lions (10-1, 6-1 Big Ten) beat No. 15 Michigan State next week, they can lock up a trip to the Rose Bowl.
snippet: If the Nittany Lions (10-1, 6-1 Big Ten) beat No. 15 Michigan State next week, they can lock up a trip to the Rose Bowl.
